content.item: Hello, everyone! My name is Akila, and I am a passionate UI developer. I'm excited to have the opportunity to introduce myself and share my experience in this field.

I have been working as a UI developer for three years, and during this time, I have developed a strong understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices. I enjoy crafting visually appealing and intuitive interfaces that enhance the user experience.

My technical skills include proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, which are the foundation of front-end development. I am well-versed in modern frameworks such as React and Angular, and I am constantly keeping up with the latest industry trends and emerging technologies.
